relation: Intel® Atom™ Z3740 Processor Quad Core (1.33GHz, 2MB)
Up to 128GB integrated eMMC storage Up to 32GB add-on Micro SD card support
Integrated JBL®-designed stereo speakers (on tablet) and subwoofer (on keyboard-dock)
10.1" Full HD display (1920 x 1200) with 10-point touch and 178o wide-viewing angle

Mini HDMI port to connect to larger screens Micro-USB port to connect and transfer data Integrated USB 2.0 connector (on keyboard-dock) Micro-SD card reader Audio combo jack (headphone and mic)

textAfterTable: Specifications may vary Software Offering Offerings Description Multimedia & Productivity Skype™, Camera Man Zinio™, Amazon® Kindle Lenovo Cloud Storage, Evernote® Office 365 Photo Touch Security & Support Lenovo® VeriFace® Pro Lenovo Companion Lenovo Support McAfee® Internet Security – 30-day trial Accessories & Services Lenovo Miix 2 (10-inch)Accessories & Services Lenovo Miix 18W AC Adapter(UL) Get power when and where you need it with a Lenovo Miix AC adapter. Keep one in the office, another at home for convenient access to power. Just plug it into an available wall outlet to deliver AC power to your Miix and to recharge the Miix internal battery. Miix AC Adapter is compact, energy efficient and backed by a 1 year warranty. System building block accessory. Performs to the same specifications as the standard AC adapter that ships with the Miix.
